comment: The Teichmüller-Tukey Lemma, an Axiom of Choice equivalent. If ` A ` is a nonempty collection of finite character, then ` A ` has a maximal element with respect to inclusion. Here "finite character" means that ` x e. A ` iff every finite subset of ` x ` is in ` A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2015.)
